extendedInfo.description: SecureSafe - the highly secure password manager and data safe in one. This well-kept secret amongst security experts protects your passwords and documents from malicious hackers and unauthorized access.In contrast to many other companies, SecureSafe Password Manager provides customer specific encryption for your data. This means that each document has its own key, and this security key is hung on a customer-specific key ring. One login for all platforms: you can access your account via the SecureSafe web application or through the iPhone/iPad apps and therefore have access to your documents and passwords at anytime and from anywhere.Currently 400'000 users worldwide â 100% data storage in Switzerland â data backup provided in a former Swiss military bunker in the Swiss Alps. Developed by a team of Swiss security experts, SecureSafe incorporates the same high level of security found in modern e-banking solutions. Continuous external security checks by McAfee Secure Service. Feedback from our users about SecureSafe Password Manager: "Excellent, simple, cross platform and free!""Love it! It's easy times use. Password protected and keeps everything secure. Wouldn't use anything else.""More than I wanted - one app on all my devices! I wanted a simple password keeper, but it does so much more and so simply."YOUR MOST IMPORTANT DATA AT A SINGLE PLACEâ Passwordsâ PINsâ Credit card detailsâ Online banking access codesâ Documentsâ Contracts and Certificatesâ Picturesâ VideosSECURE PASSWORD MANAGER & FILE SAFEâ Highly secure AES-256 and RSA-2048 encryptionâ Only you can access your data - not even our employeesâ All data between SecureSafe and your device is sent over HTTPS onlyâ Passwords are even additionally encrypted for highest securityâ Strong authentication (with SMS token) available for PRO, SILVER and GOLD account holdersâ Data storage in a former headquarter bunker of the Swiss armyâ 24/7 monitoring of all our systems from three continentsâ Data inheritance function in the event that something should happen to youâ Read more: www.securesafe.com/en/security.htmlEVERYWHERE AT ANY TIMEâ Access all your data using a single login on all your devicesâ Also available as web application and iPhone/iPad appâ Offline access for all your passwordsâ Fully featured web application available at www.securesafe.com/myloginFREEâ 50 passwords and files up to 10 MBâ Will always remain free of chargeUPGRADE POSSIBILITIESâ You can upgrade your account at any time in our web applicationâ Account Types: SecureSafe Password PRO, SILVER and GOLDâ Unlimited number of passwordsâ Strong authentication with SMS tokenâ Additional storage capacityâ Secure PDF and image viewer on the PC/Macâ PDF Annotations on Android devicesSecureSafe Password Manager attracts thousands of new users every week - read more about the leading password and file manager here: www.securesafe.com
